description: Numbers that are primitively but not imprimitively represented by x^2+xy+y^2.
comments: Also numbers that are squarefree and primitively represented by x^2+x*y+y^2. - _Frank M Jackson_, Nov 08 2013
mathematica: lst = {}; Do[k=x^2+x*y+y^2; If[(SquareFreeQ[k] && GCD[x, y]==1) || k==0, AppendTo[lst, k]], {x, 0, 100}, {y, 0, x}]; Union@lst (* _Frank M Jackson_, Nov 08 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
